Adobe Flash is a multimedia authoring program developed by [https://www.adobe.com/ Adobe Systems] with built-in support for [[Flash File]]s.
Flash can be used for animating vector graphics, text, images, and scripting with ActionScript.
Published Flash content is viewed via a third-party Flash Players called Scaleform.

You can download it from the official website [https://www.adobe.com/products/animate.html here].

== Notes ==
*Newer releases of Adobe Flash have been rebranded as Adobe Animate for Creative Cloud.
